TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SemaphoreSecurity extends System.Security.AccessControl.NativeObjectSecurity
Public NotInheritable Class SemaphoreSecurity Inherits NativeObjectSecurity

summary.span: 表示具名號誌 (Semaphore) 的 Windows 存取控制安全性。

span.span: Represents the Windows access control security for a named semaphore.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件指定為具名的系統號誌的存取權限，也會指定如何稽核存取嘗試。A object specifies access rights for a named system semaphore, and also specifies how access attempts are audited. 號誌的存取權限由每個存取規則的規則，以表示物件。Access rights to the semaphore are expressed as rules, with each access rule represented by a object. 每個稽核規則由物件。Each auditing rule is represented by a object. 鏡像處理基礎的 Windows 安全性系統，在其中每個安全性實體的物件具有最多一個判別存取控制清單 (DACL) 控制對受保護的物件，和最多一個系統存取控制清單 (SACL) 指定的權限存取稽核嘗試。This mirrors the underlying Windows security system, in which each securable object has at most one discretionary access control list (DACL) that controls access to the secured object, and at most one system access control list (SACL) that specifies which access attempts are audited. DACL，SACL 會排序清單的指定存取和稽核的使用者和群組的存取控制項目 (ACE)。The DACL and SACL are ordered lists of access control entries (ACE) that specify access and auditing for users and groups. A或物件可能代表一個以上的 ACE。A or object might represent more than one ACE. > [!NOTE] > A物件可以代表本機號誌或具名的系統號誌。A object can represent a local semaphore or a named system semaphore. Windows 存取控制安全性是有意義，只會針對具名的系統號誌。Windows access control security is meaningful only for named system semaphores. ， ，和類別隱藏實作詳細資料的 Acl 和 Ace。The , , and classes hide the implementation details of ACLs and ACEs. 可讓您略過十七不同 ACE 型別和複雜性的正確維護繼承和傳用的存取權限。They allow you to ignore the seventeen different ACE types and the complexity of correctly maintaining inheritance and propagation of access rights. 這些物件也可避免下列常見的存取控制錯誤：These objects are also designed to prevent the following common access control errors: - 建立 null DACL 的安全性描述元。Creating a security descriptor with a null DACL. DACL 的 null 參考可讓任何使用者將存取規則加入物件，而可能建立阻斷服務攻擊。A null reference to a DACL allows any user to add access rules to an object, potentially creating a denial-of-service attack. 新物件一律開頭空白的 DACL，拒絕對所有使用者的所有存取。A new object always starts with an empty DACL, which denies all access for all users. - 違反 Ace 的標準順序。Violating the canonical ordering of ACEs. 如果在 DACL 中的 ACE 清單不會保留在標準順序，使用者可能會不小心提供存取受保護的物件。If the ACE list in the DACL is not kept in the canonical order, users might inadvertently be given access to the secured object. 比方說，拒絕的存取權限必須一律會出現之前允許的存取權限。For example, denied access rights must always appear before allowed access rights. 物件會在內部維護正確的順序。 objects maintain the correct order internally. - 管理安全性描述元旗標，這應該是僅資源管理員的控制之下。Manipulating security descriptor flags, which should be under resource manager control only. - 建立無效的 ACE 旗標組合。Creating invalid combinations of ACE flags. - 操作繼承的 Ace。Manipulating inherited ACEs. 繼承和傳用是由資源管理員，以回應變更您對存取和稽核規則處理的。Inheritance and propagation are handled by the resource manager, in response to changes you make to access and audit rules. - 插入 Acl 中的無意義的 Ace。Inserting meaningless ACEs into ACLs. 不支援.NET 安全性物件的唯一功能是應避免大部分的應用程式開發人員，如下所示使用模擬的危險活動：The only capabilities not supported by the .NET security objects are dangerous activities that should be avoided by the majority of application developers, such as the following: - 通常由資源管理員的低層級工作。Low-level tasks that are normally performed by the resource manager. - 新增或移除存取控制項目不會維護標準排序的方式。Adding or removing access control entries in ways that do not maintain the canonical ordering. 若要修改具名號誌的 Windows 存取控制安全性，請使用方法來取得物件。To modify Windows access control security for a named semaphore, use the method to get the object. 新增和移除規則，以修改安全性物件，然後使用方法來重新附加它。Modify the security object by adding and removing rules, and then use the method to reattach it. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您所做的變更物件不會影響具名號誌的存取層級直到您呼叫更改的安全性物件指派給具名號誌的方法。Changes you make to a object do not affect the access levels of the named semaphore until you call the method to assign the altered security object to the named semaphore. 若要從一個號誌的存取控制安全性複製到另一個中，使用方法來取得物件，代表存取規則和稽核規則的第一個的號誌，則使用方法或建構函式可接受物件，要將這些規則指派給第二個號誌。To copy access control security from one semaphore to another, use the method to get a object representing the access and audit rules for the first semaphore, then use the method, or a constructor that accepts a object, to assign those rules to the second semaphore. 中的安全性描述元定義語言 (SDDL) 投資的使用者可以使用方法來設定具名號誌的存取規則和方法，以取得字串，表示 SDDL 格式中的存取規則。Users with an investment in the security descriptor definition language (SDDL) can use the method to set access rules for a named semaphore, and the method to obtain a string that represents the access rules in SDDL format. 這不是建議用於新的開發。This is not recommended for new development. > [!NOTE] > Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 不支援同步處理物件的安全性。Security on synchronization objects is not supported for Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範之間的區隔規則和規則，並在相容的規則會顯示權限的組合。The following code example demonstrates the separation between rules and rules, and shows the combination of rights in compatible rules. 此範例會建立物件、 將規則，允許和拒絕目前使用者的各種權限，並顯示規則的結果組。The example creates a object, adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user, and displays the resulting pair of rules. 此範例會允許目前使用者的新權限，並顯示結果，顯示新的權限會與現有合併規則。The example then allows new rights for the current user and displays the result, showing that the new rights are merged with the existing rule. > [!NOTE] > 此範例不會附加至安全性物件物件。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 附加安全性物件的範例可在和。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity.AddAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity.AddAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新物件永遠會啟動具有空的判別存取清單 (DACL)，拒絕對所有使用者的所有存取。A new object always starts with an empty discretionary access list (DACL), which denies all access for all users.

span.span: This class is not supported on Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, valuetype System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections includeSections) cil managed
Public Sub New (name As String, includeSections As AccessControlSections)

param.name: name
param.span: 要擷取其存取控制安全性規則的系統號誌名稱。

span.span: The name of the system semaphore whose access control security rules are to be retrieved.

param.name: includeSections
param.span: 旗標的組合，指定要擷取的區段。

span.span: A combination of flags specifying the sections to retrieve.

summary.span: 從具有指定名稱的系統號誌，使用指定的存取控制安全性規則區段，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified sections of the access control security rules from the system semaphore with the specified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式可讓您取得而不需要第一個建立的具名的系統號誌的存取控制安全性物件。This constructor allows you to obtain the access control security for a named system semaphore without first creating a object. 使用具名的系統物件時請務必小心。Caution must be exercised when working with named system objects. 如果沒有名為系統物件`name`不號誌，可能會擷取其存取控制安全性。If there is a system object named `name` that is not a semaphore, its control access security might be retrieved.

exception.span: Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 上不支援這個類別。

span.span: This class is not supported on Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property AccessRightType As Type
public: virtual property Type ^ AccessRightType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 類別用來表示存取權限的列舉型別 (Enumeration)。

span.span: Gets the enumeration that the class uses to represent access rights.

value.span: 物件，表示 列舉型別。

span.span: A object representing the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生自類別類別覆寫屬性，並傳回它們用來表示存取權限類型。Classes that derive from the class override the property and return the type they use to represent access rights. 當您使用陣列或包含多個類型的安全性物件的集合時，使用這個屬性來判斷要使用每個安全性物件的正確的列舉類型。When you work with arrays or collections that contain multiple types of security objects, use this property to determine the correct enumeration type to use with each security object.

summary.span: 以指定的存取權限、存取控制和旗標，為指定的使用者建立新的存取控制規則。

span.span: Creates a new access control rule for the specified user, with the specified access rights, access control, and flags.

returns.span: 物件，表示指定之使用者的指定權限。

span.span: A object representing the specified rights for the specified user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立存取控制規則的建議的方式是使用的建構函式類別。The recommended way to create access control rules is to use the constructors of the class. > [!NOTE] > 雖然沒有意義的具名號誌繼承和傳用旗標，就仍然可以指定它們不建議問題，因為它不必要地變得非常複雜的規則，維護工作，例如藉由干擾規則的組合否則，就會相容。Although inheritance and propagation flags are meaningless for named semaphores, it is still possible to specify them This is not recommended, because it needlessly complicates the maintenance of rules, for example by interfering with the combination of rules that would otherwise be compatible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生自類別類別覆寫屬性，並傳回它們用來表示存取規則類型。Classes that derive from the class override the property and return the type they use to represent access rules. 當您使用陣列或包含多個類型的安全性物件的集合時，使用這個屬性來判斷正確的存取規則型別，若要使用每個安全性物件。When you work with arrays or collections that contain multiple types of security objects, use this property to determine the correct access rule type to use with each security object.

span.span: If none are found, adds the new rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會搜尋具有相同的使用者或群組和相同的規則做為`rule`。The method searches for rules with the same user or group and the same as `rule`. 如果找不到，`rule`加入。If none are found, `rule` is added. 如果找到相符的規則是中的權限`rule`會與現有的規則合併。If a matching rule is found, the rights in `rule` are merged with the existing rule. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範之間的區隔規則和規則，並在相容的規則會顯示權限的組合。The following code example demonstrates the separation between rules and rules, and shows the combination of rights in compatible rules. 此範例會建立物件、 將規則，允許和拒絕目前使用者的各種權限，並顯示規則的結果組。The example creates a object, adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user, and displays the resulting pair of rules. 此範例會允許目前使用者的新權限，並顯示結果，顯示新的權限會與現有合併規則。The example then allows new rights for the current user and displays the result, showing that the new rights are merged with the existing rule. > [!NOTE] > 此範例不會附加至安全性物件物件。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 附加安全性物件的範例可在和。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity.AddAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity.AddAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 以指定要套用規則的使用者的方式，建立新的稽核規則、要稽核的存取權限以及觸發該稽核規則的結果。

span.span: A object representing the specified audit rule for the specified user.

span.span: The return type of the method is the base class, , but the return value can be cast safely to the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立的稽核規則的建議的方式是使用的建構函式類別。The recommended way to create audit rules is to use the constructors of the class. > [!NOTE] > 雖然沒有意義的具名號誌繼承和傳用旗標，就仍然可以加以指定。Although inheritance and propagation flags are meaningless for named semaphores, it is still possible to specify them. 這不是建議，因為它不必要地變得非常複雜的規則，維護工作，例如藉由干擾的情況下無法相容的規則組合。This is not recommended, because it needlessly complicates the maintenance of rules, for example by interfering with the combination of rules that would otherwise be compatible.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool RemoveAccessRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreAccessRule rule) cil managed
Public Function RemoveAccessRule (rule As SemaphoreAccessRule) As Boolean

param.name: rule
param.span: ，其會指定要搜尋的使用者和 ，以及必須與相符的規則 (如果找到的話) 相容的繼承和傳用旗標集合。

span.span: A that specifies the user and to search for, and a set of inheritance and propagation flags that a matching rule, if found, must be compatible with.

param.span: 如果找到的話，指定從相容的規則中移除此權限。

span.span: Specifies the rights to remove from the compatible rule, if found.

summary.span: 搜尋具有與指定之規則相同的使用者和 (允許或拒絕) 以及具有相容的繼承和傳用旗標的存取控制規則。如果找到這樣的規則，則會移除指定之存取規則中所包含的權限。

span.span: Searches for an access control rule with the same user and (allow or deny) as the specified rule, and with compatible inheritance and propagation flags; if such a rule is found, the rights contained in the specified access rule are removed from it.

returns.span: 如果找到相容的規則，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a compatible rule is found; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前擁有相同的使用者和相同的規則中搜尋的值`rule`。The current is searched for a rule that has the same user and the same value as `rule`. 如果找到任何這類規則，會採取任何動作，且此方法傳回`false`。If no such rule is found, no action is taken, and the method returns `false`. 如果找不到相符的規則，其繼承和相容性旗標會檢查在指定的旗標與相容性的`rule`。If matching rules are found, their inheritance and compatibility flags are checked for compatibility with the flags specified in `rule`. 如果找到不相容的規則，會採取任何動作，且此方法傳回`false`。If no compatible rule is found, no action is taken, and the method returns `false`. 如果找到相容的旗標的規則，在指定的權限`rule`移除相容的規則，且此方法傳回`true`。If a rule with compatible flags is found, the rights specified in `rule` are removed from the compatible rule, and the method returns `true`. 如果`rule`指定不包含在相容的規則的權限，這些權限方面會採取任何動作。If `rule` specifies rights not contained in the compatible rule, no action is taken with respect to those rights. 如果從相容的規則，會移除所有的權限，整個規則會移除從目前物件。If all rights are removed from the compatible rule, the entire rule is removed from the current object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 雖然您可以藉由建立以指定的號誌的存取規則的繼承和傳用旗標方法，不建議這麼做。Although you can specify inheritance and propagation flags for semaphore access rules, by creating them with the method, this is not recommended. 繼承和傳用不具任何意義的具名號誌，而且它們會使存取規則的維護更為複雜。Inheritance and propagation have no meaning for named semaphores, and they make the maintenance of access rules more complicated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來移除權限中的規則物件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to remove rights from an rule in a object. 它也會示範中的其他權限`rule`都會被忽略。It also shows that other rights in `rule` are ignored. 此範例會建立物件，並新增規則，允許和拒絕目前使用者的各種權限。The example creates a object and adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user. 權限允許包含， ，和。The rights allowed include , , and . 這個範例會建立新的規則，針對目前的使用者，包括並權限，並使用該規則方法來移除從中的規則物件。The example then creates a new rule for the current user, including and rights, and uses that rule with the method to remove from the rule in the object. 多餘中以滑鼠右鍵`rule`會被忽略。The extraneous right in `rule` is ignored. > [!NOTE] > 此範例不會附加至安全性物件物件。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 附加安全性物件的範例可在和。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity.RemoveAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity.RemoveAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity.RemoveAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity.RemoveAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Searches for all access control rules with the same user and (allow or deny) as the specified rule and, if found, removes them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前具有相同的使用者以及相同的規則中搜尋物件的值`rule`。The current object is searched for rules that have the same user and the same value as `rule`. 所指定的任何權限`rule`執行這項搜尋時，會忽略。Any rights specified by `rule` are ignored when performing this search. 如果找不到任何相符的規則，會不採取任何動作。If no matching rules are found, no action is taken. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示方法會移除比對使用者的所有規則和，略過權限。The following code example shows that the method removes all rules that match user and , ignoring rights. 此範例會建立物件、 將規則，允許和拒絕目前使用者的各種權限，並接著將合併到額外的權限規則。The example creates a object, adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user, and then merges additional rights into the rule. 這個範例會建立新的規則，可讓目前的使用者取得擁有權，並使用該規則，移除規則從物件。The example then creates a new rule that allows the current user to take ownership, and uses that rule to remove the rule from the object. > [!NOTE] > 此範例不會附加至安全性物件物件。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 附加安全性物件的範例可在和。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity.RemoveAccessRuleAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity.RemoveAccessRuleAll/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity.RemoveAccessRuleAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity.RemoveAccessRuleAll/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveAccessRuleSpecific(class System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreAccessRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 要移除的 。

span.span: The to remove.

summary.span: 搜尋與指定規則完全相符的存取控制規則，如果找到的話，便加以移除。

span.span: Searches for an access control rule that exactly matches the specified rule and, if found, removes it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此規則會移除完全符合才`rule`中所有的詳細資訊，包括 旗標。The rule is removed only if it exactly matches `rule` in all details, including flags. 其他規則具有相同的使用者和不會受到影響。Other rules with the same user and are not affected. > [!IMPORTANT] > 規則表示一或多個基礎的存取控制項目 (ACE)，以及這些項目分割或修改使用者的存取安全性規則時，視需要結合。A rule represents one or more underlying access control entries (ACE), and these entries are split or combined as necessary when you modify the access security rules for a user. 因此，規則可能不再存在中特定的表單時加入，並在此情況下方法無法將它移除。Thus, a rule might no longer exist in the specific form it had when it was added, and in that case the method cannot remove it. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示方法需要完全相符，才能移除規則，和規則，以允許和拒絕權限會彼此獨立。The following code example shows that the method requires an exact match in order to remove a rule, and that rules to allow and deny rights are independent of each other. 此範例會建立物件、 將規則，允許和拒絕目前使用者的各種權限，並接著將合併到額外的權限存取規則。The example creates a object, adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user, and then merges additional rights into the access rule. 此範例接著會將傳遞的原始規則方法，並顯示結果，顯示不會刪除。The example then passes the original rule to the method, and displays the results, showing that nothing is deleted. 此範例接著會建構比對的規則中的規則物件，並成功使用方法來移除規則。The example then constructs a rule that matches the rule in the object, and successfully uses the method to remove the rule. > [!NOTE] > 此範例不會附加至安全性物件物件。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 附加安全性物件的範例可在和。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity.RemoveAccessRuleSpecific#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity.RemoveAccessRuleSpecific/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity.RemoveAccessRuleSpecific#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity.RemoveAccessRuleSpecific/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前會搜尋具有相同的使用者的稽核規則`rule`。The current is searched for an audit rule that has the same user as `rule`. 如果找到任何這類規則，會採取任何動作，且此方法傳回`false`。If no such rule is found, no action is taken, and the method returns `false`. 如果找不到相符的規則，其繼承和相容性旗標會檢查在指定的旗標與相容性的`rule`。If matching rules are found, their inheritance and compatibility flags are checked for compatibility with the flags specified in `rule`. 如果找到不相容的規則，會採取任何動作，且此方法傳回`false`。If no compatible rule is found, no action is taken, and the method returns `false`. 如果找到相容的旗標的規則，在指定的權限`rule`移除相容的規則，且此方法傳回`true`。If a rule with compatible flags is found, the rights specified in `rule` are removed from the compatible rule, and the method returns `true`. 如果`rule`指定不包含在相容的規則的權限，這些權限方面會採取任何動作。If `rule` specifies rights not contained in the compatible rule, no action is taken with respect to those rights. 如果從相容的規則，會移除所有的權限，整個規則會移除從目前物件。If all rights are removed from the compatible rule, the entire rule is removed from the current object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 雖然您可以藉由建立以指定的號誌的稽核規則的繼承和傳用旗標方法，不建議這麼做。Although you can specify inheritance and propagation flags for semaphore audit rules, by creating them with the method, this is not recommended. 繼承和傳用不具任何意義的具名號誌，而且它們會使稽核規則的維護更為複雜。Inheritance and propagation have no meaning for named semaphores, and they make the maintenance of audit rules more complicated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此規則會移除完全符合才`rule`中所有的詳細資訊，包括 旗標。The rule is removed only if it exactly matches `rule` in all details, including flags. 不會影響其他的稽核規則相同的使用者。Other audit rules for the same user are not affected. > [!IMPORTANT] > 規則表示一或多個基礎的存取控制項目 (ACE)，以及這些項目分割或修改使用者的稽核安全性規則時，視需要結合。A rule represents one or more underlying access control entries (ACE), and these entries are split or combined as necessary when you modify the audit security rules for a user. 因此，規則可能不再存在中特定的表單時加入，並在此情況下方法無法將它移除。Thus, a rule might no longer exist in the specific form it had when it was added, and in that case the method cannot remove it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有使用者符合指定之規則的存取規則`rule`加入。If there are no access rules whose user matches the specified rule, `rule` is added. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何方法會取代為相符的項目中指定之規則的比對使用者的所有規則。The following code example shows how the method replaces all rules for the matching user with the rule specified for the match. 此範例會建立物件，並新增規則，允許和拒絕目前使用者的各種權限。The example creates a object and adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user. 這個範例會建立新的規則，可讓您目前的使用者完整控制，並使用方法，以使用新的規則來取代這兩個現有的規則。The example then creates a new rule that allows the current user full control, and uses the method to replace both of the existing rules with the new rule. > [!NOTE] > 此範例不會附加至安全性物件物件。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 附加安全性物件的範例可在和。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的規則有，這個方法的效果是移除所有規則指定的使用者，並取代成指定的規則。If the specified rule has , the effect of this method is to remove all rules for the specified user, replacing them with the specified rule. 如果指定的規則有，則所有規則指定的使用者會取代指定的規則。If the specified rule has , all rules for the specified user are replaced with the specified rule. 如果沒有任何規則的使用者並符合指定之規則`rule`加入。If there are no rules whose user and match the specified rule, `rule` is added. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何方法會移除比對這兩個使用者的所有規則和的`rule`，以取代`rule`。The following code example shows how the method removes all rules that match both the user and the of `rule`, replacing them with `rule`. 此範例會建立物件，並新增規則，允許和拒絕目前使用者的各種權限。The example creates a object and adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user. 這個範例會建立新的規則，可讓您目前的使用者完整控制，並使用方法來取代現有允許使用新的規則的規則。The example then creates a new rule that allows the current user full control, and uses the method to replace the existing Allow rule with the new rule. 不會影響的規則，拒絕存取。The rule that denies access is not affected. > [!NOTE] > 此範例不會附加至安全性物件物件。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 附加安全性物件的範例可在和。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and .
